short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Modifies the MLPLounge css to better match best human/pony's color scheme. Also sets font to normal.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Injects custom CSS into the PLounge so you can stare at best human/pony while browsing. Also resets the font if the mods decide to screw with it (again).
